tweet_text: @coalman1936 @Earthjustice While solar and wind power is relatively environmentally friendly, the production of and lack of recycling of the materials used to create solar panels and wind turbines is NOT environmentally friendly. Solar panels often contain lead, cadmium, and other toxic chemicals.

tweet_text: @unsorsodicorda Some of my vim plugins do not work in tmux. Lightline as an example.  The downside of screen is that it doesn't display the split screen after reattach. I stick with screen after all. Less dependencies, smaller binary footprint...
